name: d3-graphviz
description: Graphviz DOT rendering and animated transitions for D3

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-selection:d3,d3-transition:d3,d3-interpolate:d3,d3-zoom:d3,viz.js:Viz -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-graphviz.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-graphviz.js -c -m -o build/d3-graphviz.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-graphviz.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-graphviz.js build/d3-graphviz.min.js
